Finding Companies to Apply To

Job Boards and job board and job boards, OH MY. Seriously, there are a lot of jobs out there. Here’s a list of places to start your search. Remember, there are other more active approaches you can take as well, like going to meetups or hackathons.

  • 37signals Job Board
  • Github’s Job Board
  • Smashing Magazine’s Job Board
  • Mashables Job Board
  • Angel List
  • Stack Overflow Job Board
  • Built in Chicago Job Board
  • Bright.com
  • Craigslist
  • Twitter searches: ruby+hire, ruby+job
  • Illinois Tech Association Job Board
  • Top Ruby Jobs
  • Ruby Weekly
  • Ruby Inside Job Board
  • Built in Chicago’s List of Top Digital Companies in Chicago
